    • ReservationManager

      public ReservationManager(ArrayList<Reservation> reservations, ArrayList<Table> tables)
      Initalize all reservations and tables
      Parameters:
      reservations - a list of all reservations
      tables - a list of all tables

  • Method Details

    • getReservations

      public ArrayList<Reservation> getReservations()
      Get array of all reservations
      Returns:
      an array of reservations

    • makeReservation

      public void makeReservation(String customerName, int customerContact, int numOfPax, Calendar arrivalTime, int tableId)
      Make new reservation and will set table status to OCCUPIED Reservation id is made by getting the last reservation id and adding 1
      Parameters:
      customerName - preferred name of the customer
      customerContact - customer contact number
      numOfPax - number of people for reservations
      arrivalTime - arrival time for reservation
      tableId - table allocated to reservation

    • checkValidReservationDate

      public boolean checkValidReservationDate(Calendar date)
      This is to check if date is valid 1. Format has to be correct dd/mm/yyyy 2. No date should be 3 months later from current date
      Parameters:
      date - reservation date
      Returns:
      true if valid, false if invalid

    • checkValidReservationTime

      public boolean checkValidReservationTime(Calendar time)
      This is to check if time is valid 1. Time cannot be pass working hours 2. Booking only should be made every 0 or 30th minute of the hour
      Parameters:
      time - of reservation
      Returns:
      boolean value if reservation is valid

    • getValidReservationDateTime

      public Calendar getValidReservationDateTime()
      First, gets date input and checks for incorrect format If format is right, next step is to check for valid date When date is valid, an array of time slots will be returned Only time displayed in the array can be selected
      Returns:
      valid reservation arrival time

    • showAllReservations

      public void showAllReservations()
      Display all reservations made with full details

    • showReservationShort

      public int showReservationShort()
      Display all reservations in a shorter format reservation id and reservation date/time
      Returns:
      number of reservations

    • searchReservation

      public void searchReservation(int resId)
      Search for specific reservations
      Parameters:
      resId - unique reservation id

    • showTimeSlots

      public List showTimeSlots(Calendar date)
      Calculate the available time slots for the date Only future/advanced time will be display
      Parameters:
      date - date and time of reservation
      Returns:
      array of valid time slots for date

    • checkReservations

      public List checkReservations(Calendar date)
      Checks for all reservations that have the same date and time
      Parameters:
      date - reservation date/time
      Returns:
      list of valid time slots

    • removeReservation

      public int removeReservation(int resId)
      Remove specific reservation by Id Will check if reservation for table has any pending orders before removing
      Parameters:
      resId - reservation id
      Returns:
      reservation id = success; -1= there is a pending order for table; 0= reservation id cannot be found
